name: Shrimp and Noodles with Chili Crisp Sauce
author: Diana71
summary: Shrimp is cooked with garlic, ginger, and shallots, mixed with noodles, and combined with a tangy chili crisp sauce.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and finely chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Meanwhile, mix shrimp with salt and baking soda; let sit for 15 minutes
Combine mayonnaise, soy sauce, chili crisp, gochujang, and sugar in a medium bowl
Rinse shrimp with cool water and pat dry with paper towels
Warm oil in a saute pan over medium heat
Cook and stir shallot, garlic, and ginger for 1 minute
Add shrimp and cook until bright pink and opaque, 4 to 5 minutes
Add scallions and cook for 1 minute longer
Pour the chili crisp sauce over the shrimp
Mix in the cooked spaghetti and toss until evenly coated
